channel.title: Writing on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on open-archaeo

item.title: anatolia-bibliography-map
item.description: The goal of this project is to spatially locate bibliographic resources regarding the archaeology of Anatolia (modern Turkey). This takes the bibliography of archaeology to the next level by showing not only the topics and authors, but where the archaeological research is being done.

item.title: Archaeological_Catalogue_from_CSV_Spreadsheet
item.description: A template to create an archaeological catalogue from a spreadsheet using the LaTeX csvsimple package.

item.title: c14-date-extractor
item.description: Script for extracting c14 dates from text.

item.title: pdf-to-nested-xml
item.description: Script to convert a folder of Dutch archaeological reports (PDFs) to XML files nested by section, chapter, heading.
